ygData.subject: Re: Solusek
ygData.msgSnippet: You only need a group of 2 really.  One is a bit crazy.  You just stay at the zone and pull things there and fight.  It is best to fight down in the room near
ygData.messageBody:
You only need a group of 2 really. One is a bit crazy. You just stay at the
zone and pull things there and fight. It is best to fight down in the room near
the sol b zone. It is nicely spaced out and it is safe to zone into sol b.
Atleast for a short while. Have a tank with you, and a healer is always nice.
With those 3 in a party you should be fine, but even a full party is cool
there. you can pull MoBs according to your party. You get plenty of FS as
loot, and good exp.

Tony Buser wrote:

> From: "Tony Buser" <gr0k@...>
>
> You went there at lvl 20? With how many people in your group? Did you talk
> to the gnomes and check for any info? For the heck of it, I did a /who all
> gnome 40 50 and found one at lvl 43 and asked him about solusek. He said
> he's been there and talked to the gnomes and they didn't have any tinkering
> information. But he said he doesn't tinker so he wasn't specifically
> looking for that kind of info.

--Eron
aeron@...
